Package migratedb.core.api.internal.jdbc

Class JdbcTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • migratedb.core.api.internal.jdbc.JdbcTemplate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigQueryJdbcTemplate, SpannerJdbcTemplate
    public class JdbcTemplate
extends Object
    Collection of utility methods for querying the DB. Inspired by Spring's JdbcTemplate.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Connection connection
      The DB connection to use.
      protected int nullType
      The type to assign to a null value.

        Type Parameters:

        rowMapper - The row mapper to use.

        The list of results.
        Throws:
